profile.name: Jiandong Ding (丁建栋)
profile.title: Principal Algorithm Expert
profile.bio: Principal algorithm expert at Huawei Technologies focusing on RecSys, Causal Inference, and LLM Agents

news.title: Paper "Mitigating Popularity Bias in Recommendation" accepted by ACM TOIS
Paper "Hierarchical and Preference-Aware Generative Recommendations" accepted by TheWebConf (WWW) 2026
Two papers accepted! "RPE4Rec" by WSDM 2026, and "Invariant Feature Learning" by AAAI 2026

researchProjects.title: [WWW 2026] Generative Recs: Hierarchical & Preference-Aware
researchProjects.problem: Existing "flat-sequence" generative models overlook the hierarchical structure of user sessions and introduce noise in long histories.
researchProjects.breakthrough: We proposed HPGR, a two-stage generative framework. It combines structure-aware pre-training with preference-guided sparse attention to capture the true hierarchy of user interests, achieving SOTA performance.

researchProjects.title: [AAAI 2026] Causal Inference for Watch-time Prediction
researchProjects.problem: In short-video feeds, "duration biases" (longer videos naturally get more watch time) mislead algorithms.
researchProjects.breakthrough: We introduced Invariant Feature Learning based on counterfactual inference to uncover the user's true willingness to watch, independent of video length.

researchProjects.title: [WSDM 2026] RPE4Rec: High-Efficiency Dynamic Retrieval
researchProjects.problem: Advanced Transformers are often too slow for real-time retrieval on billion-scale items.
researchProjects.breakthrough: We designed a novel Relative Position Encoding (RPE) mechanism specifically for dynamic node retrieval. This architecture significantly reduces inference latency while capturing complex sequential patterns.

researchProjects.title: [KDD 2024] Low-Rank Compression for CTR Prediction
researchProjects.breakthrough: A unified framework to compress massive CTR models using low-rank factorization, enabling high-performance ranking on resource-constrained devices (e.g., mobile phones).

researchProjects.title: [ICSOC 2025] NL2SQL Benchmark for Business Intelligence
researchProjects.breakthrough: Evaluating how Large Language Models (LLMs) act as Data Agents to translate natural language into complex SQL queries, enabling automated business decision-making.

researchProjects.title: [NeurIPS 2021] DP-SSL: Robust Semi-supervised Learning
researchProjects.problem: Deep learning performance heavily relies on massive labeled data, which is expensive to obtain.
researchProjects.breakthrough: We introduced a Data Programming (DP) scheme that automatically generates probabilistic labels for unlabeled data, achieving SOTA performance with minimal supervision (only 40 labeled samples).
